title: Lavash
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, European, Fusion, German, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Typical Turkish-German doner kebab shop that offers a variety of vegan specialties such as doner kebab with faux doner meat (called voner), baked goods, borek and fresh made-in-house french fries with a choice of different vegan sauces. Also sells packaged vegan snacks such as energy bars, gummy bears and spacebar sausages.
